description:
runtime: mark arm _lsvh nosplit (may fix arm build)

Mark the 386 one too for consistency,
although most of that code is no longer used.

messages.text:
Hello dvyukov (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=c632dcca98ca ***

runtime: mark arm _lsvh nosplit (may fix arm build)

Mark the 386 one too for consistency,
although most of that code is no longer used.

TBR=dvyukov
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/12227043

LGTM

netbsd/arm wants _lshv to not use any stack for local variables, see https://codereview.appspot.com/11963044

subject: code review 12227043: runtime: mark arm _lsvh nosplit (may fix arm build)
